about_the_game:
Argonix: The Rise of Kings

Unite the peoples. Forge an empire. Become a legend.

In Argonix: The Rise of Kings, every decision shapes history. Play as Minar Myras, a visionary king striving to unite a world torn by conflict. Diplomacy, epic battles, and unexpected alliances will be your weapons to build an everlasting kingdom.

An epic story with impactful choices

After the tragic loss of his father, Minar must face an uncertain destiny. Ancient prophecies, power struggles, and betrayals will define your quest for unity. Will your reign be marked by peace... or by blood?

A unique strategic experience

  • Two innovative gameplay modes: an isometric world map for management and a platformer mode for resource gathering and tactical control.

  • Intense strategic battles: position your troops, use your Leaders' unique abilities, and dominate the battlefield.

  • A deep diplomacy system: negotiate, betray, or forge alliances to achieve your goals.

  • A living, dynamic world: each faction has its own beliefs, traditions, and vision of unification.

Why should you play Argonix?

✔ A rich and immersive story shaped by your choices. ✔ An innovative fusion of real-time strategy and RPG elements. ✔ A universe crafted for over 20 years, offering unparalleled depth. ✔ Battles and events that adapt to your playstyle.

🔥 Will you be the sovereign who unites the people, or the tyrant who plunges the world into chaos? Add Argonix: The Rise of Kings to your wishlist and prepare to make history!
